extra.enrollment_requirement: EXCLUSION  No more than 6.0 units from HIST124/6.0; HIST278/3.0; HIST279/3.0

basic.description: An introduction to major themes and events in the history of Canada placed in a North American and world context. Topics include relations between natives and newcomers, comparative colonialism, the emergence of nation-states and new social and cultural identities. Assignments emphasize analysis of historical texts and development of research and writing skills.
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: Canada in the World
